message:
Trying to use connect's basic auth async method, but I can't get the request to resolve.
https://gist.github.com/936994

just noticed i was passing in the wrong function name for my authenticate method, but still can't actually authenticate because request() is also async, so the authenticate method finishes before the response comes back
I haven't done a ton with js, mostly just jquery stuff, but what am I don't wrong here?
